description: Empatica designs and builds wearable devices with clinical-quality sensing capabilities, targeting the neurological disease space with a focus on epilepsy.
ENA is a nutrition, health and wellness group company that manufactures, distributes and sells nutritional products.
Encompass Onsite provides a solution for property owners to effectively manage their facility maintenance operations.

One of the fastest growing space companies in Europe, EnduroSat designs and engineers NanoSats and shared satellite services for business applications and space exploration missions. It is focused on inter-satellite connectivity and space data applications.
Enmedio offers digital media communication services. The company offers innovative solutions aimed at corporate communication, advertising and digital marketing.

Entersekt provides customer-centric fintech solutions for financial service providers and enterprises. Its software converts most mobile devices into a second layer authentication tool, creating a powerful weapon in the fight against financial fraud.

Entic is a cloud-based analytics company enabling customers to tackle energy efficiency challenges within commercial real estate. It provides advanced analytics which deliver real-time, actionable insight into a building’s performance and energy efficiency, ultimately generating significant savings by reducing energy consumption.
Envoys (formerly Off Bound Adventures) creates outdoor, educational programs that empower, challenge and inspire students of all ages to become global citizens.
Epitome is a platform that enables educational institutions, governments, and enterprises to better prepare incoming talent and better engage existing talent.

Equilife Medical makes critical care needs more available and affordable by offering medical device rental, on-site operating staff, and maintenance services to intensive care units and homecare patients.

Ergon is a line of affordable-luxury restaurants that are combined with functional grocery stores featuring fine high-quality products, ensuring that traditional Greek produce meets the 21st-century standards.
[email protected] provides educational services and content for students from preschool to college.
Etermax is a multi-platform social game developer.
eTree is digital agency combining brand strategies and creative solutions for the local market.
EVAM builds platforms for customer management and engagement.
Evenuttus uses technology to change how people experience events.

Evermos is an Indonesian retail enabler platform and the country’s largest reseller based social commerce. The company helps emerging and challenger local brands expand their presence across Indonesia efficiently by harnessing Evermos’ shared infrastructure and ecosystem.
EveryMundo provides airlines with performance marketing technology for direct channel growth and customer acquisition.
Expensya provides professionals with a web and mobile solution that automates business spend management.

EZYTEC is a Colombian engineering firm specialized in design, development, support, and marketing of automated parking payment systems and multifunctional ATMs customizable to any business model and customer need.
